definition: to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Officials in Iraq have increased security in the Shiite city of Karbala.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克官員已加強了什葉派城市卡爾巴拉的戒備。

sentences.english: I often take my mind off my work by reading a worthwhile novel.
sentences.chinese: 通常我通過閱讀小說使我的戒備力從工作上轉移過去。

sentences.english: And slowly, you will see them let their guards down.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢地，你會看到他們放鬆了戒備。

sentences.english: Knowing that danger threatened, the sentry was on the alert.
sentences.chinese: 因爲知道危險勢將發生，這哨兵加意戒備。

sentences.english: Both sides put their nuclear forces in high alert.
sentences.chinese: 雙方的核力量都在高度戒備中。

sentences.english: South Korea is not taking any immediate steps to raise its level of defense alert.
sentences.chinese: 韓國軍方也沒有計劃提升防衛戒備。

sentences.english: The troops (were) stood down: it was a false alarm.
sentences.chinese: 部隊解除了戒備狀態，原來是虛驚一場。

sentences.english: I often take my mind off my work by redriving instructorng a straightforward novel.
sentences.chinese: 通常我通過閱讀小說使我的戒備力從勞動上轉移過去。

sentences.english: The governor has declared a state of emergency for San Bernardino County.
sentences.chinese: 加州政府宣佈聖貝那迪諾縣進入緊急戒備狀態。

sentences.english: The world is alert and on guard as never before.
sentences.chinese: 世界從沒有向現在這樣保持警惕和戒備。

sentences.english: We downgraded the military alert from emergency to standby.
sentences.chinese: 我們把軍事戒備從緊急狀態降至待命狀態。

sentences.english: Knowing that danger threatened, they were on the alert.
sentences.chinese: 因爲知道可能會發生危險，他們處於戒備狀態。

sentences.english: And for the first time, she is
sentences.chinese: 這是她第一次放下架子，毫無戒備地與他一同歡笑。

sentences.english: Even the celestial world is heavily guarded.
sentences.chinese: 神仙世界也是戒備森嚴的。

sentences.english: Twice he had seen leopards pouncing on unsuspecting young baboons.
sentences.chinese: 他兩次目睹羣豹向毫無戒備的小狒狒猛撲過去。

sentences.english: The troops are standing by tonight.
sentences.chinese: 部隊今晚處於戒備狀態。

definition: to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
to take action/to adopt policies/to move on some issue
to handle/to take care of/to punish
to be on duty (of a security guard etc)
to turn a blind eye to
to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
